name: SoundOff.fm
tag_list: music, music-discovery, game, music-industry, indie-music, bands
overview:
We are the Pepsi Challenge of the Music World… Where an artist is not measured by the length of his track, but by how his music fares in battle.

We all love music. But one thing that sucks hard about the Internet is sifting through it all, trying to find the good stuff. Thatâ€™s why the world needs SoundOff.

Artists upload the best 20 seconds of their music and pick a genre. Then, voters pick a genre and hear two clips, back to back. They give each a blind listen and vote for the tracks they like better. Itâ€™s that simple.

Itâ€™s a blind taste-test, without the bias of today’s music industry. We want to know who really comes out on top of the genre when you take out all the fluff and let the music speak for itself.

And itâ€™s the best way to discover new music, period.
